data.taskTitle: Fix WelcomeScreen showing when projects exist
summary: Fixed race condition in /projects page where WelcomeScreen showed for users with existing projects
Added await to fetchConfigProjects() call so configProjects is populated before isInitialLoad becomes false
allProjects derived value now correctly includes config projects when page renders

filesModified.description: Added await to fetchConfigProjects() to fix timing issue

reviewFocus: Check that projects page shows all projects correctly

quality.preExisting: TypeScript implicit any warnings in unrelated files

suggestedTasks.title: Add TypeScript types to dashboard API endpoints
suggestedTasks.description: Multiple API endpoints have implicit any types for request/url/params. Add explicit types to fix TypeScript warnings.
suggestedTasks.reason: Noticed during TypeScript check - multiple files have implicit any warnings

patterns: In SvelteKit onMount, ensure async data fetches are awaited before setting loading states to false
gotchas: Multiple parallel fetches without await can cause race conditions where isLoading becomes false before data is ready
